DataElement.preferredName: Informed Consent Form Signed Days From Anchor Date Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of calendar days from the data set base date to the date on which an individual signed the procedure  consent document.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Informed Consent Form Signed Days From Anchor Date
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A document explaining all the relevant information to assist an individual in understanding the expectations and risks in making a decision about a procedure. This document is presented to and signed by the individual or guardian._Individual's name or personal mark, used to sign documents and employed to signify that the writing which precedes accords with one's wishes and intentions; having a handwritten signature._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument._The base date from which all other dates within a cohort or data set are derived.
